docs.snippet: The reception Michael Sam, who is gay, will receive in the N.F.L. will probably depend on how well he produces on the field....
docs.lead_paragraph: The reception Michael Sam, who is gay, will receive in the N.F.L. will probably depend on how well he produces on the field.
docs.abstract: NFL's reception of Michael Sam, top college football defensive lineman who has come out as gay, will probably depend on how well he produces on the field; his declaration has engendered a range of public reaction, most of it positive, but it will be tested in the NFL draft, or when he meets his new teammates.

headline.main: In N.F.L., It’s Now Question of Ability, Not Orientation
headline.print_headline: In N.F.L., It’s Now Question of Ability, Not Orientation

docs.snippet: Let me get this, um, straight: Some N.F.L. players can withstand crushing tackles but not an openly gay teammate?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Let me get this, um, straight: Some N.F.L. players can withstand crushing tackles but not an openly gay teammate?
docs.abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column mocks commentators and others who fear upheaval in locker rooms now that University of Missouri defensive end Michael Sam is on track to become first openly gay player in the NFL; argues that such anxieties are ridiculous, and based on long-outdated stereotypes of gay men.

docs.snippet: On average, upper-level tickets dropped a little more than 10 percent and lower-level seats increased 3 percent....
docs.lead_paragraph: On average, upper-level tickets dropped a little more than 10 percent and lower-level seats increased 3 percent.
docs.abstract: New York Jets adjust their ticket prices, dropping the cost of some tickets at MetLife Stadium and increasing others; on average, upper-level tickets dropped a little more than 10 percent and lower-level seats increased 3 percent.

docs.snippet: Michael Sam, a defensive end at Missouri who will enter the N.F.L. draft, announced Sunday that he was gay. People in his hometown of Hitchcock, Tex., and on his college team voiced their support....

headline.main: Back Home, Sense of Pride in Michael Sam

docs.snippet: Changes announced by Attorney General Holder will advance equality and the justice system....
docs.lead_paragraph: Changes announced by Attorney General Holder will advance equality and the justice system.
docs.abstract: Editorial praises updated policies unveiled by the Justice Department as it seeks to eliminate distinction between same-sex and opposite-sex married couples in the federal justice system; criticizes Obama administration for hesitating to move forward with measure that would bar federal contractors from refusing to hire workers on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.

headline.main: Gay Rights and the Justice Department
headline.print_headline: Gay Rights and the Justice Department
